title: Riot Fix The Store with the Current Sale
body:
Recently, Frostfire Annie, Lumberjack Sion and Fisherman Fizz just got put up for the sale, although the champions (Irelia etc.) were on sale about 10 HOURS AGO- The skins have been on 975 for a while and a few have bought it but for the full price.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-2701-3001

replies.body: This was corrected yesterday, can you please confirm this is still an issue?
Hi Kat Bot, thanks for the report, I am looking into this now.
